meanings.sent1: The dreamful child fell asleep with a smile on their face.
meanings.sent2: She gazed at the dreamful stars twinkling in the night sky.
meanings.sent3: The dreamful puppy chased imaginary butterflies in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The dreamful clouds drifted lazily across the blue sky.
meanings.sent5: Her dreamful imagination painted vibrant pictures in her mind.

meanings.definition: Characterized by or conducive to dreaming.
meanings.sent1: The cozy, dreamful bed made it hard to get up in the morning.
meanings.sent2: The dreamful music played softly in the background as she worked.
meanings.sent3: The dreamful movie transported the audience to a magical world.
meanings.sent4: The dreamful garden was filled with colorful flowers and buzzing bees.
meanings.sent5: The dreamful atmosphere of the room made her feel relaxed and content.
